wikipedia_page.main: Norman Crowther Hunt, Baron Crowther-Hunt (13 March 1920 – 16 February 1987) was a British scholar and Labour politician. He served as a Minister of State in Harold Wilson's 1974–1976 government, and became Rector of Exeter College, Oxford in 1982.

response: * Norman Crowther Hunt, Baron Crowther-Hunt, (1920–1987), British scholar and Labour politician
* Norman Crowther Hunt, Baron Crowther-Hunt of Eccleshill – former Labour education minister from 1974–76, Rector from 1982-87 of Exeter College, Oxford
